email.subject: Important: Submit Your Voter Form to Your Election Office
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

We're glad you've been able to use the Vote-Print-Mail system to generate your Federal Write-in Absentee Ballot (FWAB) and that you can cast your vote in this important election! Please read the instruction letter carefully.

You must download, print, sign and send in your FWAB. You can check your State Requirements/ Voter Materials Transmission Options to confirm the various options for transmitting your form.

Remember to check the witness requirements and then sign your cover page form and send it with your ballot to your election official who needs your original signature.

If the ballot from your election office arrives after you have sent in your FWAB, please complete it and send it in to replace the FWAB.

US Vote is a nonprofit, nonpartisan public charity powered by a dedicated team of volunteers. Please help us - Make a Donation Today!

Here's to you for casting your ballot!
- From the volunteer team at U.S. Vote Foundation

P.S. Get your Voter Reward Badge!

Choose from a selection of Voter Reward Badges - spiff up your social media profile and spread the word to other voters! Go here to get your badge: https://www.usvotefoundation.org/voter-reward-badge

P.P.S. Please give back to Help Us to Help More Voters:

We work hard to make sure that you can vote. And when you give to us, you can be sure – Every Dollar Counts. And your voting effort goes further.

$1 x 1 helps assure another voter gets their ballot.

$1/month has 12 times the impact.

$3/month has 36 times the impact.

$10/month has 120 times the impact every year!

Please Join Us as a Foundation Member - a small monthly contribution will make a major difference – it will change everything about what we can do for you and other voters. Go to https://www.usvotefoundation.org/donate

Contact us at voterhelpdesk@usvotefoundation.org anytime with questions or comments.
